original_title: 妻とのセックスレスに悩む僕は、あの日から義妹と肉体関係になった。 深田えいみ
overview: This one guy is having a crisis with her wife, and they haven’t had sex for half a year. He is even beginning to consider divorce.  In this junction, one day, the wife’s sister Eimi Fukada comes to visit. A young girl with flawless fair skin that flaunts around her sexiness, making the guy feel weak about it.
title: Since My Wife And I Weren’t Having Any Sex, Ever Since That Day, I Entered Into Sexual Relations With My Little Sister-In-Law Amy Fukada
